channel.title: IPs
channel.description:
I have dial-up, so my IP is dynamic, it changes the last few numbers every time I reconnect. Would I be safe reconnecting every time before I use Aryan without using a proxy? I understand they rarely do IP bans anyways, but they can still see my ISP. Is there anyway they can link my autoing accounts to my main? Yeah, the odds say "no," but I'm just a bit paranoid and would like a straight answer.
Thank youu :)[br][size=1]Posted at: May 03, 2006, 11:08:38 am[/size][hr]Well, they've banned a few autoers and not my main yet, so I'm guessing I answered my own question. :p

item.title: IPs
item.dc:creator: @muerte4 muerte4
item.description:
@muerte4 wrote:

use a proxy just to be safe =D

Read full topic
